name: Prisonscape (Canceled)
blurb: An RPG adventure game. Can you survive the harsh and unforgiving environment of a prison? "Game ain't based on sympathy."

rewards.reward: DIGITAL WALLPAPER \r\n______________________________ You'll receive our eternal thanks and a digital Prisonscape wallpaper.

DIGITAL DOWNLOAD - EARLY BIRD
______________________________ Receive a DRM-free digital download of the game when it's released.
______________________________
Includes $1 tier

DIGITAL DOWNLOAD
______________________________
Receive a DRM-free digital download of the game when it's released.
______________________________
Includes $1 tier

BETA DIGITAL STARTER PACK - EARLY BIRD
______________________________
Receive a DRM-free digital download of the game when it's released, beta access to the game before release, access to backer-only forums, and a digital download of the soundtrack.
______________________________
Includes $1 and $11 tiers

BETA DIGITAL STARTER PACK
______________________________
Receive a DRM-free digital download of the game when it's released, beta access to the game before release, access to backer-only forums, and a digital download of the soundtrack.
______________________________
Includes $1 and $11 tiers

DIGITAL DELUXE - EARLY BIRD
______________________________
Digital art book with exclusive look at concept art, developer commentary video digital download, art creation time lapse video digital download, and early access to the modding tools.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, and $18 tiers

DIGITAL DELUXE
______________________________
Digital art book with exclusive look at concept art, developer commentary video digital download, art creation time lapse video digital download, and early access to the modding tools.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, and $18 tiers

A HIDDEN MESSAGE
______________________________
Create and hide a message in the game. Send us your message (max 200 characters) and we'll hide it somewhere in the game - for example, it could be the writing on a wall or a note found in a book. Some limitations apply, so you should contact us with your ideas to make sure they're okay.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers

INMATE SPRITER
______________________________
Collaborate with us to make an inmate by using our sprite sheet, and we'll put the character in the game! Some limitations apply, so you should contact us with your ideas to make sure they're okay.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers

COMBAT COORDINATOR
______________________________
Design your own attack/defense - There are several special attacks and defenses in the game, and with this pledge you can add one more. Prison is a no-holds barred environment and everything goes. Contact us with your idea before pledging as some limitations may apply.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers

MASTERMIND
______________________________
Design a job (quest) for the game. Jobs can vary from writing lyrics for aspired young rapper or killing a rival gang member for stealing crack. You also get a cool Prisonscape T-shirt!
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers

INMATE DESIGNER
______________________________
Design your own criminal mastermind. You'll work with the team to create an inmate for the prison. You can decide his name, personality, looks, convictions, and motives. In addition you can work with us to write some dialogue or even a small job for the character. You'll also receive a Prisonscape t-shirt with a truly unique design.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers

AREA DESIGNER
______________________________
Design your own mini-area for the game! Collaborate with us to make a small area in the game based on your ideas. This mini-area may include inmates and jobs. You'll also receive Prisonscape swag bag and a T-shirt with a truly unique design. 
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers

THE PRODUCER
______________________________
Design your own story line for Prisonscape - Collaborate with us to make a short side story for Prisonscape, with inmates, jobs and art direction by YOU. You'll also receive Prisonscape swag bag and a T-shirt with a truly unique design.
______________________________
Includes $1, $11, $18, and $33 tiers
